body_html:
@DjangoPeng, my mail is peter@questmatic.commailto:peter@questmatic.com.
Welcome to discuss.

From: Jingtian Peng [mailto:notifications@github.com]
Sent: Monday, August 15, 2016 10:00 AM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow tensorflow@noreply.github.com
Cc: Bixiong Xu bix@microsoft.com; Mention mention@noreply.github.com
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] Tensorflow distributed RNN crashed on ProtoBuf when using 3*512 rnn. (#3766)

@bixiongxuhttps://github.com/bixiongxu I'm trying to change the seq2seq model to distributed model. Could I ask you some question about that? My email is pjt73651@gmail.commailto:pjt73651@gmail.com, look forward to your reply!

—
